column5: This is a great option for a group get-a-way. Spend a night (or 2, or 3) with us at the Samadhi Retreat.   We can provide air mattresses for up to 6 people to sleep in the Great Room and enjoy our peaceful natural country retreat.  First guest is $33, second+ is $15 each.   The Great Room has a high vaulted ceiling & the energy of multiple spiritual retreats held in this space.  For an additional price we can provide a Meditation Ceremony for you and your group.
